original: Ime kho panāyyāyo satta adhikaraṇasamathā dhammā uddesaṁ āgacchanti.
analyzed: ime kho pana ayyāyo satta adhikaraṇa samathāḥ dhammāḥ uddesam āgacchanti

original: Uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, satta adhikaraṇasamathā dhammā.
analyzed: uddiṭṭhāḥ kho ayyāyo satta adhikaraṇa samathāḥ dhammāḥ
tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti
uddiṭṭhāḥ cha saṭṭhi satā pācittiyāḥ dhammāḥ

original: Ettakaṁ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṁ suttapariyāpannaṁ anvaddhamāsaṁ uddesaṁ āgacchati.
analyzed: ettakam tassa bhagavato sutta āgatam sutta pariyāpannam anvaddha māsam uddesam āgacchati

original: Tattha sabbāheva samaggāhi sammodamānāhi avivadamānāhi sikkhitabbanti.
analyzed: tattha sabbāhi iva samaggāhi sammodamānāhi a vivadamānāhi sikkhitabbanti
